packs.name: Intermediate Bulk Containers 1000 kg Local Steel not specified (1)

marketing: The high quality additive system is designed specifically for the grease to be used in railroad axle journal roller bearings, which are designed not to be lubricated in the field, including those in the newer, more heavily loaded double stacked container cars. The additive system also promotes superior protection against oxidation.
